title: Commercial vehicle sales volume to fall 3-6 pc in FY25: Report
description: Commercial vehicle sales volume is expected to decline by 3-6 per cent in the current fiscal year due to a slump in demand, as reported by CareEdge Ratings. The slowdown is attributed to reduced demand in both the medium, heavy commercial, and light commercial vehicle segments, alongside high inventory levels with dealers.
